answers.answer: If your over 20 weeks of pregnancy go to your doctor/midwife asap and get your blood pressure checked again and check ur urine for protein, sounds like pre-eclampsia or very bad odema
Yes go get checked for pre eclampsia asap!

I'm 18.5 weeks which is why I'm confused. My bp was 102/60 on Thursday at an appt. and 128/94 on Monday. I've been sitting down/laying all day and still swelling. Is it possible to be preeclampsia before 20 weeks? My next doctor appt. isn't until June 13th

It is possible but its rare, could be odema, dont add salt! Drink lots of fluids and put your feet up above your heart level and move around aswell but make sure to rest! But go see someone anyways! Hope your okay.
128/94 ??? The bottom reading is high!!!!! So i would go back and check again

question: The past few days I have had a lot of swelling out of no where. So much to where a ring that would normally fall off if I tipped my hand won't come off at all and is leaving imprints in my skin. I've also been blacking out and getting severe headaches and dizziness with vision problems. Is this normal?? Last time my blood pressure was taken 102/60 so it isn't super high... I'm worried and confused.
title: Sudden swelling??
